from where buses ply every 30 minutes. It takes 30 minutes to 45 minutes to travel. By car it takes just 15 to 20 minutes.
On foot as it is a small village. Alternately three wheeler auto rickshaws are available - fares for which need to be bargained.

value: House of Tyagaraja in Thirumanjana Lane

Walk around the streets and if possible walk towards Thillaisthanam village to get the feel of what Tyagaraja's Thiruvayaru was like.

Sit in the hall in Samadhi absorbing silence and outside enjoying silent breezes coming over River Kaveri.
